text: @realDonaldTrump While we're at it, we should drain the water egress around your brain... Oh, wait, you haven't got one. Perhaps you should put bleach into your skull and tell us if it will defeat Coronavirus and then drain it out once it's cured. No? Well, pipe down, and get back into your box.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
